u.depBarks: They think they're so tough and so special, with their fancy magic ice powers? I could do that too! I just need whatever... [i]trick[/i] they're using. This is the start of [i]our[/i] legend!
u.atkBarks: And now, the incredible Bront charges in!^I am Bront! And the world will remember how [i]great[/i] I am! ^This will be my next greatest triumph!
u.healBarks: Ha; let's see these pathetic imbeciles attack through this!^It doesn't reflect well on us, taking losses from degenerate scum. I won't stand for it!
u.buildBarks: Our foes are not worthy to gaze upon my handiwork.^Ta-da!
u.vicBarks: [Heshe takes a deep breath, and pauses. A moment passes with fear in hiser eyes, but heshe soon shakes it off] I-I'm strong. I'm strong!^Hah! I defeated yet another... ancient powerful being! Yeah!^Yet another amazing feat of strength!
u.defBarks: I didn't lose! [Heshe fights back tears] You all lose! I'm out of here, losers!
u.frnFireBarks: -EXPL-! -CHAR2-! What fresh incompetence is this?! face[Yell Mad]
u.diaGreeting: type`Greeting^id`grtArro1^r`y^resp`Greeting Response^n`2^txt`It appears we're now working in proximity to one another going forward... [Bront strokes his eyebrows.] ...and so it seems to me that you should know my proper appellation. You may refer to me as Bront the Unbelievable.^min1Fam`0^max1Fam`4^fam2`5^char1AttReq`Arrogant^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^innerText`^nodeCategory`Greeting^categoryDesc`|type`Greeting^id`grtArro0^r`y^resp`Greeting Response^n`2^txt`Surely you are aware that ignoring one's comrades is a mark of poor breeding... [Bront strokes his eyebrows.] ...however, as I'm feeling magnanimous, I'll forgive the transgression. I am called Bront the Unbelievable. Charmed, I'm sure.^min1Fam`0^max1Fam`4^fam2`5^char1AttReq`Arrogant^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^face`Irritated^innerText`^nodeCategory`Greeting^categoryDesc`
u.diaGreetingResponse: type`Greeting Response^id`grspArro0^r`y^n`2^txt`You don't say. Well-TIC2-you may refer to me as Bront the Unbelievable. u.diaInfoResponse: type`Info Response^id`irspArro0^r`y^n`2^txt`My goodness. Well-TIC2-do let me know if you come up with any other morsels of information you wish to share.^char1AttReq`Arrogant^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^face`Mean^innerText`^nodeCategory`InfoResp^categoryDesc`
u.diaInfoResponseSad: type`Info Response Sad^id`irspArroS0^r`y^n`2^txt`Heavens. How terrible. Well-TIC2-on the bright side, there are worse fates to suffer. But instead, you're you: quite the upgrade, I think you'll agree.^char1AttReq`Arrogant^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^face`Sad^innerText`^nodeCategory`InfoRespSad^categoryDesc`

u.diaBackgroundFamily: type`Background Family^id`bacgFamMomAndDad01^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^topic`their families^txt`I had a carefree childhood living with my -BIO:raised by-. I could come and go as I pleased. We were not wealthy, but it didn't matter--we had each other. I miss them.^reqBioDetail`raised by,mother and father^reqNPC`relation,mother/associatedFeeling,happy+relation,father/associatedFeeling,happy^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundFam^categoryDesc`
u.diaBackgroundWhat: type`Background What^id`bacgWhatSprig01^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^topic`the past^txt`I grew up with stories of relatives who fought in the Shadow War a long time ago. I couldn't get enough of hearing about it. I guess you could say that the fight against tyranny is in my blood. I do really love being a farmer, but there are more important things, you know?^char1Race`Spriggat^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundWhat^categoryDesc`
u.diaBackgroundWhere: type`Background Where^id`bacgWhereRavinale^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^topic`where they came from^reqBioDetail`hometown,Ravinale^txt`I was raised in -BIO:hometown-, a city-state in -BIO:region- on the coast of the Shimmering Desert. It's a huge city, and quite wealthy. A lot of folks there feel like they live in the center of the world, like everything outside of the city is unimportant. I find the attitude...unpleasant.^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundWhere^categoryDesc`
u.diaSecret: type`Secret^id`secrArro01^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^txt`Can I tell you something? I know the others must think I'm awfully arrogant; maybe even callous. And I admit, I can be a bit... [Bront strokes his eyebrows.] ...disparaging at times. But above all else, the fact is that I am hardest of all on myself. I have very high standards for myself, and it fills me with disgust when I don't live up to them. It's all or nothing with me: I must be flawless at all times, or else I feel completely devoid of value. Do you understand?^char1AttReq`Arrogant^min1Fam`15^min1Friend`5^fam1`5^fam2`0^frnd1`6^frnd2`6^innerText`^nodeCategory`Secret^categoryDesc`

u.depBarks: Sssaaaa! Thosse falssse idolsss have ssstood too long! ...It'ss my turn!
u.atkBarks: You lack faith in me, and that wasss your downfall.^Repent! To me, sssspecifically!^Bear witnessss!
u.healBarks: Witnessssss my miraclesss!^Your sssservice issss not over.^Ssssstay up, pawn!

u.diaGreeting: type`Greeting^id`grtRelig1^r`y^resp`Greeting Response^n`2^txt`What a blessing! I am Rustler. Where some see luck, I see intention! u.diaBackgroundFamily: type`Background Family^id`bacgFamMomOrDad02^r`n^resp`Info Response Sad^n`2^topic`their families^txt`I grew up comfortable. My -BIO:raised by- was always working; -NPC:heshe$,-BIO:raised by-- did -NPC:hiser$,-BIO:raised by-- best, but we didn't have much of a relationship. It was rare to see -NPC:himer$,-BIO:raised by-- smile.^reqBioDetail`raised by,mother/raised by,father^reqNPC`relation,mother/associatedFeeling,sad$relation,father/associatedFeeling,sad^face`Sad^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundFam^categoryDesc`
u.diaBackgroundWhat: type`Background What^id`bacgWhat05BadRelationshipMom^r`n^resp`Info Response Sad^n`2^topic`the past^txt`It took me a while to work up the nerve to tell my -BIO:raised by- that I was going to be doing this with my life. -NPC:Heshe$,-BIO:raised by-- was [i]so[/i] upset; -NPC:heshe$,-BIO:raised by-- said I was throwing my life away, that I was wasting my talents. But being a blacksmith was never my life goal. -NPC:Heshe$,-BIO:raised by-- never understood that.^lifeSkillExcl`bounty hunter,burglar,pickpocket^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^reqBioDetail`raised by,mother^reqNPC`relation,mother/associatedFeeling,angry$relation,mother/associatedFeeling,sad^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundWhat^categoryDesc`
u.diaBackgroundWhere: type`Background Where^id`bacgWhereKalkerapur^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^topic`where they came from^reqBioDetail`hometown,Kalkerapur^txt`I was born here in -BIO:hometown-. I hope you appreciate it!^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundWhere^categoryDesc`
u.diaSecret: type`Secret^id`secr16^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^txt`I want to tell you something. I can't stand my body. It sounds incredibly small-minded, but I look at other people and I just...I end up wishing I could switch. It's not even the whole body, necessarily: I want a smile like that. I wish I had eyes like those. Muscle tone like that; hands like those. How could it be right that I was put into this dumpy thing while others got ones that are just so much...nicer? [Heshe sighs heavily.] It's just not fair.^char1AttExcl`Suave^min1Fam`15^min1Friend`5^fam1`5^fam2`0^frnd1`6^frnd2`6^innerText`^nodeCategory`Secret^categoryDesc`

u.diaBackgroundFamily: type`Background Family^id`bacgFamGrandmaOrGrandpa02^r`n^resp`Info Response Sad^n`2^topic`their families^txt`My father left when I was young. After my mother died, I was taken in and raised by my -BIO:raised by-. -NPC:Heshe$,-BIO:raised by-- tried -NPC:hiser$,-BIO:raised by-- best, but there was always a distance between us. Deep down, I think -NPC:heshe$,-BIO:raised by-- blamed me for my mother being gone. I'm grateful for what -NPC:heshe$,-BIO:raised by-- did, but we've never had much of a relationship.^reqBioDetail`raised by,grandmother/raised by,grandfather^reqNPC`relation,grandmother/associatedFeeling,sad$relation,grandfather/associatedFeeling,sad^face`Sad^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundFam^categoryDesc`
u.diaBackgroundWhat: type`Background What^id`bacgWhatGambler^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^topic`the past^txt`Before I came out here, I was a gambler. I was comfortable enough; money wasn't the issue for me. The issue is that you can only win so many times before you get a reputation. Once that happens, everyone refuses to play with you. It's move on or starve. I got tired of it, to be honest.^lifeSkillReq`gambler^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundWhat^categoryDesc`
u.diaBackgroundWhere: type`Background Where^id`bacgWhereSomnus^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^topic`where they came from^reqBioDetail`hometown,Somnus^txt`I hail from -BIO:hometown-, the grand subterranean capital of the Shadowling Republic. There is no other place like it. I know that probably sounds arrogant, but it's true: imagine a miles-long cavern beneath the earth filled with shadowlings and distinctive shadowling architecture. It will always have a place in my heart.^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundWhere^categoryDesc`
u.diaSecret: type`Secret^id`secr10^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^txt`I have to tell you something about myself...I was once engaged to be married. It was a mistake: I was too young, and we were a bad fit. I should have said something, but...the day before the ceremony, I fled like a damned coward. I think about it sometimes; I wonder if I even truly deserve happiness after what I did.^min1Fam`15^min1Friend`5^fam1`5^fam2`0^frnd1`6^frnd2`6^innerText`^nodeCategory`Secret^categoryDesc`

u.atkBarks: This better be worth it.^They've heard enough out of you!^Stop asking questions!
u.healBarks: I don't know if we're going to make it at this rate...^This won't do any good if you keep taking hits like this...
u.vicBarks: The lesson to be learned here is to know your place, and to give me money.

u.diaGreeting: type`Greeting^id`grtPess1^r`y^resp`Greeting Response^n`2^txt`Greetings. Not sure what good I thought this would do, but here I am. Name's Jules Acepocket.^min1Fam`0^max1Fam`4^fam2`5^char1AttReq`Pessimistic^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^face`Concerned^innerText`^nodeCategory`Greeting^categoryDesc`|type`Greeting^id`grtPess0^r`y^resp`Greeting Response^n`2^txt`Hello, I'm Jules Acepocket. I'll be frank with you: my heart's not strong enough for investing in people. They always leave. But...I wouldn't mind being almost-friends.^min1Fam`0^max1Fam`4^fam2`5^char1AttReq`Pessimistic^char1AttExcl`Friendly^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^face`Concerned^innerText`^nodeCategory`Greeting^categoryDesc`
u.diaGreetingResponse: type`Greeting Response^id`grsp0^r`y^n`2^txt`-NAME-, huh? Nice name. So, I go by Jules Acepocket. Sorry, I need to go eat some food before I curl up and implode from hunger. You can join me if you like--or we'll talk more later.^fam2`5^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Shadowling^innerText`^nodeCategory`GreetingResp^categoryDesc`|type`Greeting Response^id`grspPess0^r`y^n`2^txt`Hi there, glad to meet you. I'm Jules Acepocket. I'll be blunt: I try to avoid friendshipsthey never last, and it always hurts when they end. But...I wouldn't mind being almost-friends.^fam2`5^char1AttReq`Pessimistic^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^face`Concerned^innerText`^nodeCategory`GreetingResp^categoryDesc`
u.diaInfoResponse: type`Info Response^id`irspRelig0^r`y^n`2^txt`Hm, interesting. This reminds me of a proverb we have in -BIO:religion-...but I don't want to derail your story. Thanks for telling me. It may not make a difference, but-TIC2-I do feel a little better knowing more about you.^char1AttReq`Pessimistic^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^face`Concerned^innerText`^nodeCategory`InfoResp^categoryDesc`
u.diaInfoResponseSad: type`Info Response Sad^id`irspPessS0^r`y^n`2^txt`Oof. Life can be so rotten sometimes. We can only ever look backwards--try to make sense of things long after they've happened. The future...we can't see. It's terrifying.^char1AttReq`Pessimistic^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^face`Concerned^innerText`^nodeCategory`InfoRespSad^categoryDesc`
u.diaHobby: type`Hobby^id`hobbyPess01^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^txt`[Jules sighs.] Battle, battle, battle...it's all such a drag, don't you think? All it'll take is one misplaced arrow, and that's it. I wouldn't mind having some -HOBBY- to comfort me. The way they -HOBBYTXT-...it would really make for a welcome respite.^char1AttReq`Pessimistic^char1AttExcl`Disciplined^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`14^fam2`5^frnd1`1^face`Sad^innerText`^nodeCategory`Likes^categoryDesc`
u.diaLike: type`Like^id`likePess02^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^txt`[Jules sighs.] Sometimes I think about how lousy people are, and...ugh. Nothing short of candles can get me out of that headspace, you know? The way they make everything glow a soft, warm orange...it's like magic.^char1AttReq`Pessimistic^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`14^fam2`5^frnd1`1^face`Sad^innerText`^nodeCategory`Likes^categoryDesc`
u.diaNickname: type`Nickname^id`nick01^r`n^n`2^resp`Nickname Response^txt`A thought occurred to me. I think I'm going to call you -CHAR2- going forward. u.diaRecognitionResponse: type`Recognition Response^id`recrspPos0^r`y^n`2^txt`Okay, you know, I [i]thought[/i] I saw you, but I convinced myself it couldn't be. Ha! What are the odds? u.diaBackgroundFamily: type`Background Family^id`bacgFamMomAndDad01E^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^topic`their families^txt`I had a carefree childhood living with my -BIO:raised by-. My mother, especially, was very loving. My father, by contrast...we do not get along.^reqBioDetail`raised by,mother and father^reqNPC`relation,mother/associatedFeeling,happy+relation,father/associatedFeeling,angry^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundFam^categoryDesc`
u.diaBackgroundWhat: type`Background What^id`bacgWhat03SmallTown^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^topic`the past^txt`I was lucky: my -BIO:raised by- knew the toymaking trade, and taught me starting early. Thanks to that, I ended up one of the few people in -BIO:hometown- with enough schooling to teach; so that's what I did. I taught the art and science of toymaking down at the schoolhouse... [Jules scratches his scalp.] ...but I can only do the same old thing for so many years, you know? I never saw myself as a fighter, but I'll try it for as long as it makes sense.^lifeSkillExcl`bounty hunter,burglar,gambler,pickpocket,professor,sailor,soldier^reqBioDetail`hometownSize,small^exclBioDetail`raised by,a family friend/raised by,an orphanage/raised by,the streets^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundWhat^categoryDesc`
u.diaBackgroundWhere: type`Background Where^id`bacgWhereNotKalkerapur01^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^topic`where they came from^exclBioDetail`hometown,Kalkerapur^txt`Sometimes I think about home. As a place, I mean. The overall feeling of being there. I think about -BIO:hometown- sometimes. It used to feel like the whole world to me, but now I can see it's...a very particular place.^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundWhere^categoryDesc`
u.diaSecret: type`Secret^id`secr04^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^txt`I...have something terrible that I want to confess. There was a shy boy where I grew up... [Jules scratches his scalp.] ...I forget his name. But I used to bully him regularly. Call him names, even rough him up sometimes. I don't know why I did it... [Jules scratches his scalp.] ...but I did. I was so casually cruel. I worry sometimes that that's the real me, and everything else is just a mask.^char1AttExcl`Kind^min1Fam`15^min1Friend`5^fam1`5^fam2`0^frnd1`6^frnd2`6^innerText`^nodeCategory`Secret^categoryDesc`

u.depBarks: Mmhmm, yes, this structure has a classic uh... [Heshe strokes hiser beard] Multi-coglomitoferocious design from ah... [He pensively humms] Sometime in the last 800 years. Yes, I think I could still break in to this. Of course, I can.
u.atkBarks: You're about to hit the book! Of which, I have read many! Hyeah!^Face the wrath of a highly qualified engineer!^I'm about to misconstrue your head!
u.healBarks: -CHAR2-: My observations suggest that you could use a psychokinetic shield.^-CHAR2-, you seem to be in danger: a psychokinetic shield should help.
u.buildBarks: It's up to code. A very prestigious code. Better than what you're thinking.^A colossal effort, only achievable by the most splendiferous of makertitians.^A fine piece of work. [Heshe nods] Like all my work.
u.vicBarks: Everyone saw that, right? Hey, everyone!^Shouldn'ta made the Engineer mad.^A victory not only for science, but for me personally.
u.defBarks: Bwugh! Huwgh! Fine! [He storms away, periodically turning back to rant] Be that way, see how you do without my immense knowledge of first dimensional triangular catacoustics!

u.diaBackgroundWhat: type`Background What^id`bacgWhat01^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^topic`the past^txt`I used to be a dancer. u.diaBackgroundWhere: type`Background Where^id`bacgWhereNotKalkerapur01^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^topic`where they came from^exclBioDetail`hometown,Kalkerapur^txt`Do you ever think about where you come from? u.diaSecret: type`Secret^id`secrEmpir03^r`n^resp`Info Response Sad^n`2^txt`I seldom bring this up, but I don't believe in a benevolent god. Many years ago, my younger brother caught ill and died. It was...not a quick death. Tell me: what sort of cosmic, benevolent being would feel content to sit back and let an innocent child suffer and die like that? Either this being is not benevolent, or it just never existed in the first place. In any event, I refuse to worship it.^char1AttReq`Empirical^min1Fam`15^min1Friend`5^fam1`5^fam2`0^frnd1`6^frnd2`6^innerText`^nodeCategory`Secret^categoryDesc`

u.diaBackgroundWhat: type`Background What^id`bacgWhat05BadRelationshipMomB^r`n^resp`Info Response Sad^n`2^topic`the past^txt`It took me a while to work up the nerve to tell my -BIO:raised by- that I was going to be doing this with my life. -NPC:Heshe$,-BIO:raised by-- was [i]so[/i] upset; -NPC:heshe$,-BIO:raised by-- said I was throwing my life away, that I was wasting my talents. u.diaBackgroundWhere: type`Background Where^id`bacgWhereSmallTown02^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^topic`where they came from^reqBioDetail`hometownSize,small^txt`I grew up in -BIO:hometown- in -BIO:region-. u.depBarks: Okay, nobody else panic, this will be easy. [Heshe takes a deep breath] Let's [b]carefully[/b] break in, okay?
u.atkBarks: Aaaaaaa!^I'm sorry, it's not my fault this is happening!^Get back! N-no, get away from this place instead!
u.vicBarks: [Heshe pauses, then takes a deep breath] I-I'm okay! I'm okay, I can work with this.^...That felt better than I want to admit.^Go on, git!
u.defBarks: I knew today was gonna go wrong! [Heshe vanishes into thin air, and is then heard panicking from a distance]
u.frnFireBarks: Ouch! -CHAR2-, watch your aim! face[Yell Mad]
u.diaGreeting: type`Greeting^id`grtSens2^r`y^resp`Greeting Response^n`2^txt`[Laina mutters to himerself.] All right...let's give it a try.-NL--NL-Hi! My name is Laina Bigspook. I hope you're as considerate as you seem.^min1Fam`0^max1Fam`4^fam2`5^char1AttReq`Sensitive^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^face`Happy^innerText`^nodeCategory`Greeting^categoryDesc`|type`Greeting^id`grtSens1^r`y^resp`Greeting Response^n`2^txt`Greetings. My name is Laina Bigspook. Maybe I shouldn't say this, but...gosh. So many people act like they're your best friend, but in truth, they only put on an act to help them get what they want. It breaks my heart. [Laina wipes away a tear.]-NL--NL-H-heh...how'd that get there?^min1Fam`0^max1Fam`4^fam2`5^char1AttReq`Sensitive^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^face`Sad^innerText`^nodeCategory`Greeting^categoryDesc`
u.diaGreetingResponse: type`Greeting Response^id`grspSens1^r`y^n`2^txt`[Laina mutters to himer2self.] Come on, Laina. Everything worthwhile is a risk.-NL--NL-Excuse me. Yes, hi -NAME-; I'm Laina Bigspook. Forgive my gruffness; I'm still trying to reconcile what I do with who I am. We all have to believe we're good at heart.^min1Fam`0^max1Fam`4^fam2`5^char1AttReq`Sensitive^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^face`Happy^innerText`^nodeCategory`GreetingResp^categoryDesc`|type`Greeting Response^id`grspSens0^r`y^n`2^txt`[Suddenly, tears stream down Laina's face; heshe2 hurriedly wipes them away.] Oh boy; way to make a great first impression, right? Introductions are just a big deal to me. Meeting a whole new person; so many possibilities! I just get flooded with feelings. It's -NAME-, right? I'm Laina Bigspook.^fam2`5^char1AttReq`Sensitive^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^face`Sad^innerText`^nodeCategory`GreetingResp^categoryDesc`
u.diaInfoResponse: type`Info Response^id`irspSens0^r`y^n`2^txt`Oh wow! [Suddenly, tears stream down Laina's face; heshe2 hurriedly wipes them away.] I'm sorry; I just realized that you're sharing things with me! As a friend! Honest!^char1AttReq`Sensitive^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^face`Sad^innerText`^nodeCategory`InfoResp^categoryDesc`
u.diaInfoResponseSad: type`Info Response Sad^id`irspSensS0^r`y^n`2^txt`Oh, -NAME-... u.diaBackgroundWhat: type`Background What^id`bacgWhatPickpocketBurglarBountyHunter^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^topic`the past^txt`You know, I used to make my living as a bounty hunter. I was just scraping by; money wasn't the issue for me. It was the unreliability of it. You might do okay one week and be out on the streets the next. I wanted to try something less risky. And now I'm a gladiator. [Laina brays with laughter.] Pretty stupid, huh?^lifeSkillReq`bounty hunter,burglar,pickpocket^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundWhat^categoryDesc`

u.healBarks: There's only one way this ends: with you alive and our foes in panicked retreat!^Stay calmwe're going to get through this!
u.buildBarks: Done!^**Control the battlefield, and you'll control the battle.** Words to live by.
u.vicBarks: When we work together, there's nothing we can't accomplish!^See, friends: they're vulnerable. Let's end this!^The moment of their defeat is at hand!

u.diaGreeting: type`Greeting^id`grtNatL1^r`y^resp`Greeting Response^n`2^txt`Well met! Hope you don't mind my taking the lead here. I'm Upstart Leader. I'd love to get started. u.diaBackgroundFamily: type`Background Family^id`bacgFamMomOrDad03^r`n^resp`Info Response Sad^n`2^topic`their families^txt`I grew up struggling. u.diaBackgroundWhat: type`Background What^id`bacgWhat04Sibs^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^topic`the past^txt`I come from a family of toymakers. We were struggling; it was me, my -BIO:raised by-, and my -BIO:siblings-. My -BIO:raised by- insisted that we carry on the family legacy, training us from a young age. However... [Upstart bites the tip of his finger.] ...I wasn't the eldest, and you only need so many people to run a business toymaking. Maybe someday I'll settle down somewhere new and open a business of my own; but I'm committed to trying this, at least for now.^lifeSkillExcl`athlete,bounty hunter,burglar,gambler,pickpocket,professor,sailor,soldier^exclBioDetail`siblings,no siblings/raised by,a family friend/raised by,an orphanage/raised by,the streets^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundWhat^categoryDesc`

u.diaSecret: type`Secret^id`secr02^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^txt`Just between the two of us: I am deathly afraid of dying alone. It can be a cold and lonely world out there; I've seen it. There is nothing worse in this world than dying with no one at your bed side. It sounds selfish to say it now, but... [Upstart bites the tip of his finger.] ...I hope we'll stay close friends until the end.^min1Fam`15^min1Friend`5^fam1`5^fam2`0^frnd1`6^frnd2`6^innerText`^nodeCategory`Secret^categoryDesc`

u.depBarks: The hour arrives; I will taste their fear...
u.atkBarks: Your very existence is an affront!^My condolences to your widow!^I sentence you to death!
u.healBarks: It doesn't reflect well on us, taking losses from degenerate scum. I won't stand for it!^I'll save you.
u.buildBarks: Our foes are not worthy to gaze upon my handiwork.^Here we are!
u.vicBarks: Pitiful.^Ignoramus.^Did you actually believe you could win?
u.defBarks: Defeated by...an insect like you? Impossible... [Apostacratus collapses of hiser wounds.]
u.diaGreeting: type`Greeting^id`grtArro0^r`y^resp`Greeting Response^n`2^txt`Surely you are aware that ignoring one's comrades is a mark of poor breeding...but as I'm feeling magnanimous, I'll forgive the transgression. I am called Apostacratus. Charmed, I'm sure.^min1Fam`0^max1Fam`4^fam2`5^char1AttReq`Arrogant^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^face`Irritated^innerText`^nodeCategory`Greeting^categoryDesc`|type`Greeting^id`grtArro1^r`y^resp`Greeting Response^n`2^txt`It seems we're now working in proximity to one another for the foreseeable future...as such, it seems to me that it would be good if you knew who I am. I am called Apostacratus.^min1Fam`0^max1Fam`4^fam2`5^char1AttReq`Arrogant^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^innerText`^nodeCategory`Greeting^categoryDesc`
u.diaGreetingResponse: type`Greeting Response^id`grspArro1^r`y^n`2^txt`Ah. Well. If we're to be confederates-TIC2-I suppose we might as well make one another's acquaintance. You may refer to me as Apostacratus.^fam2`5^char1AttReq`Arrogant^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^innerText`^nodeCategory`GreetingResp^categoryDesc`|type`Greeting Response^id`grspArro0^r`y^n`2^txt`You don't say. Well-TIC2-you may refer to me as Apostacratus. u.diaBackgroundWhat: type`Background What^id`bacgWhat01^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^topic`the past^txt`I used to be a judge. It was fine enough for what it was--but the truth is, I've always dreamed of being a great warrior! And now here I am. It's already much more exciting, and the pay is better.^lifeSkillExcl`athlete,professor,soldier,gambler^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundWhat^categoryDesc`
u.diaBackgroundWhere: type`Background Where^id`bacgWhereNotDese^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^topic`where they came from^exclBioDetail`region,Dese^txt`Did you ever have a day where you woke up and thought, **I need to move away: anywhere but here**? I did. It had been some time coming, though. Life was just starting to feel too static; too limiting. So I booked passage on the first ship I could find. It took some doing to convince the captain to take me aboard. I wonder what they'd say in -BIO:hometown- if they could see me now?^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundWhere^categoryDesc`
u.diaSecret: type`Secret^id`secr15^r`n^resp`Info Response Sad^n`2^txt`Here's something I don't usually tell people: I once had a child...she didn't make it past the first year. It was one of the most difficult things I've ever had to go through; you just feel so helpless; there's this tiny being, wholly dependent on you, and you can do nothing to help them. I couldn't handle the strain of it; it ended up destroying my marriage.^char1AttExcl`Cheerful,Religious^min1Fam`15^min1Friend`5^fam1`5^fam2`0^frnd1`6^frnd2`6^innerText`^nodeCategory`Secret^categoryDesc`

[Suave winks and takes -NAME-'s hand in greeting.] I'm Suave Upstart; a pleasure.^fam2`5^char1AttReq`Suave^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^face`Happy^innerText`^nodeCategory`GreetingResp^categoryDesc`|type`Greeting Response^id`grsp0^r`y^n`2^txt`That checks out; you have that **-NAME-** look. I'm something of a -CHAR2CLASS-, myself.^fam2`5^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Shadowling^innerText`^nodeCategory`GreetingResp^categoryDesc`
u.diaInfoResponse: type`Info Response^id`irspSuav0^r`y^n`2^txt`Goodness! I'll have to add this to my book of -NAME- trivia. u.diaInfoResponseSad: type`Info Response Sad^id`irspSuavS0^r`y^n`2^txt`Ah, -NAME-...that's hard. But...maybe think of it this way: all the hard stuff eventually led you here--and here's not so bad, is it? I know [i]I'm[/i] enjoying spending time with [i]you.[/i] [Suave winks.]^char1AttReq`Suave^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^face`Kind^innerText`^nodeCategory`InfoRespSad^categoryDesc`

u.diaBackgroundFamily: type`Background Family^id`bacgFamMomAndDad04B^r`n^resp`Info Response Sad^n`2^topic`their families^txt`I grew up not wealthy. I lived with my -BIO:raised by-; up until a certain age, anyway. Once I started to mature, Father left us. He occasionally wrote letters, but couldn't be bothered to ever actually show up. Mother was never the same after that; it was a struggle.^reqBioDetail`raised by,mother and father^reqNPC`relation,mother/associatedFeeling,sad+relation,father/associatedFeeling,angry^face`Irritated^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundFam^categoryDesc`
u.diaBackgroundWhat: type`Background What^id`bacgWhat05BadRelationshipMomB^r`n^resp`Info Response Sad^n`2^topic`the past^txt`It took me a while to work up the nerve to tell my -BIO:raised by- that I was going to be doing this with my life. -NPC:Heshe$,-BIO:raised by-- was [i]so[/i] upset; -NPC:heshe$,-BIO:raised by-- said I was throwing my life away, that I was wasting my talents. But being a historian was [i]-NPC:hiser$,-BIO:raised by--[/i] dream, not mine. -NPC:Heshe$,-BIO:raised by-- never understood that.^lifeSkillExcl`bounty hunter,burglar,pickpocket^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^reqBioDetail`raised by,mother and father^reqNPC`relation,mother/associatedFeeling,angry$relation,mother/associatedFeeling,sad^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundWhat^categoryDesc`
u.diaBackgroundWhere: type`Background Where^id`bacgWhereNotDese^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^topic`where they came from^exclBioDetail`region,Dese^txt`Did you ever have a day where you woke up and thought, **I need to move away: anywhere but here**? I did. It had been some time coming, though. Life was just starting to feel too static; too limiting. So I booked passage on the first ship I could find. It took some doing to convince the captain to take me aboard. I have no regrets, no matter what folks back in -BIO:hometown- might think.^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundWhere^categoryDesc`
u.diaSecret: type`Secret^id`secr04^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^txt`Do you want to hear something awful? There was a shy boy where I grew up...I forget his name. But I used to bully him regularly. Call him names, even rough him up sometimes. I don't know why I did it...but I did. I was so casually cruel. I worry sometimes that that's the real me, and everything else is just a mask.^char1AttExcl`Kind^min1Fam`15^min1Friend`5^fam1`5^fam2`0^frnd1`6^frnd2`6^innerText`^nodeCategory`Secret^categoryDesc`

u.depBarks: The enemy knows our reputation; I can sense their fear.^Oh my. Can you sense our enemies' alarm? [Meek grins wickedly.] It is...splendid.^The hour arrives; I will feast upon their fear...

u.vicBarks: ...what are all these battles doing to me?^All this unnecessary killing...^Sheeshthank goodness that's over with. face[Sad]

u.diaGreeting: type`Greeting^id`grtSens1^r`y^resp`Greeting Response^n`2^txt`Hello. My name is Meek Upstart. I hope you're nice. Too many people appear friendly, when in fact they don't care about you at all. It breaks my heart. [Meek wipes away a tear.]-NL--NL-Geez, Meek: too much information. [Meek snort-laughs.] Reel it in a little.^min1Fam`0^max1Fam`4^fam2`5^char1AttReq`Sensitive^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^face`Sad^innerText`^nodeCategory`Greeting^categoryDesc`|type`Greeting^id`grtSens2^r`y^resp`Greeting Response^n`2^txt`[Meek mutters to himerself.] I guess I'll try my hand at this again.-NL--NL-Hi! My name is Meek Upstart. I hope you're as considerate as you seem.^min1Fam`0^max1Fam`4^fam2`5^char1AttReq`Sensitive^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^face`Happy^innerText`^nodeCategory`Greeting^categoryDesc`
u.diaGreetingResponse: type`Greeting Response^id`grspSens0^r`y^n`2^txt`[Suddenly, tears stream down Meek's face; heshe2 hurriedly wipes them away.] Geez, Meek: you're not supposed to cry when you first meet people! [Heshe2 laughs.] It's -NAME-, right? I'm Meek Upstart.^fam2`5^char1AttReq`Sensitive^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^face`Sad^innerText`^nodeCategory`GreetingResp^categoryDesc`|type`Greeting Response^id`grsp0^r`y^n`2^txt`Hm! I once knew someone named -NAME-. Anyway, you can call me Meek Upstart. Let's talk more later--I've got an appointment with a hot meal.^fam2`5^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Shadowling^innerText`^nodeCategory`GreetingResp^categoryDesc`
u.diaInfoResponse: type`Info Response^id`irspSens0^r`y^n`2^txt`Oh wow! [Suddenly, tears stream down Meek's face; heshe2 hurriedly wipes them away.] I'm sorry; I just realized that you're sharing things with me! As a friend! And it just made me feel really overwhelmed with feelings. It's okay; I'm fine now. Honest!^char1AttReq`Sensitive^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^face`Sad^innerText`^nodeCategory`InfoResp^categoryDesc`
u.diaInfoResponseSad: type`Info Response Sad^id`irspSensS0^r`y^n`2^txt`Oh, -NAME-... [Tears begin streaming down Meek's face; heshe2 hurriedly wipes them away.] Ugh, -EXPL-...now I have this pit gnawing away at the base of my stomach. Stupid empathy!^char1AttReq`Sensitive^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat,Shadowling^face`Sad^innerText`^nodeCategory`InfoRespSad^categoryDesc`
u.diaHobby: type`Hobby^id`hobby1^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^txt`I developed an appreciation for -HOBBY- some months back. I became aware of the way they -HOBBYTXT-... u.diaLike: type`Like^id`like0^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^txt`When I was younger, I came to like lilies. I quickly came to adore them for the way they flare out like a bursting star. u.diaNickname: type`Nickname^id`nick01^r`n^n`2^resp`Nickname Response^txt`So...we're friends, right? I've decided to call you -CHAR2- from here on out. u.diaNicknameResponse: type`Nickname Response^id`nickRespSens01^r`y^n`2^txt`You...you're giving me a nickname? Oh--I'm so happy, I think my heart might burst!^frnd1`1^frnd2`1^mor2`3^char1AttReq`Sensitive^face`Kind^innerText`^nodeCategory`Nicknaming^categoryDesc`

u.diaBackgroundFamily: type`Background Family^id`bacgFamMomAndDad04B^r`n^resp`Info Response Sad^n`2^topic`their families^txt`I grew up not wealthy. I lived with my -BIO:raised by-; Mother did her best, but Father was endlessly cruel to her. She just never stood up for herself. u.diaBackgroundWhat: type`Background What^id`bacgWhat05BadRelationshipDadB^r`n^resp`Info Response Sad^n`2^topic`the past^txt`It took me a while to work up the nerve to tell my -BIO:raised by- that I was going to be doing this with my life. -NPC:Heshe$,-BIO:raised by-- was [i]so[/i] upset; -NPC:heshe$,-BIO:raised by-- said I was throwing my life away, that I was wasting my talents. u.diaSecret: type`Secret^id`secrMulti01^r`n^resp`Info Response Sad^n`2^txt`I've hardly told anyone this, but...I was raised by a mean drunk. Growing up, I was always frightened of doing the wrong thing, of saying somethinganythingthat might make him suddenly and violently angry. For a small child, it was terrifying. To survive, I learned to quiet my voice. It conditioned me that way. I sometimes wonder how I would have turned out if I hadn't grown up with thatif I would be a better person...^char1AttReq`Awkward,Imaginative,Introvert,Paranoid,Sensitive^min1Fam`15^min1Friend`5^fam1`5^fam2`0^frnd1`6^frnd2`6^innerText`^nodeCategory`Secret^categoryDesc`

u.diaGreeting: type`Greeting^id`grtBlnt0^r`y^resp`Greeting Response^n`2^txt`Psst. You. Yeah, you! [Grumbly nods hiser head.] The name's Grumbly Leader. u.diaGreetingResponse: type`Greeting Response^id`grspBlnt0^r`y^n`2^txt`[Grumbly looks -NAME- up and down, nodding.] -NAME-. All right. I'm Grumbly Leader. u.diaHobby: type`Hobby^id`hobbyBlntHotT02^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^txt`Something I like, something I like... [Grumbly bites her nails.] ...oh, I've got one: -HOBBY-. u.diaLike: type`Like^id`likeBlntHotT02^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^txt`Something I like, something I like... [Grumbly bites her nails.] ...oh, I've got one: sapphires. u.diaBackgroundWhat: type`Background What^id`bacgWhat04Sibs^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^topic`the past^txt`I come from a family of carpenters. We were not wealthy; it was me, my -BIO:raised by-, and my -BIO:siblings-. My -BIO:raised by- insisted that we carry on the family legacy, training us from a young age. However... [Grumbly bites her nails.] ...I wasn't the eldest, and you only need so many people to run a business carpentering. I had no choice but to find another path...and this is where the path led me.^lifeSkillExcl`athlete,bounty hunter,burglar,gambler,pickpocket,professor,sailor,soldier^exclBioDetail`siblings,no siblings/raised by,a family friend/raised by,an orphanage/raised by,the streets^char1Race`Human,Lissit,Spriggat^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundWhat^categoryDesc`
u.diaBackgroundWhere: type`Background Where^id`bacgWhereNotKalkerapur01^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^topic`where they came from^exclBioDetail`hometown,Kalkerapur^txt`Sometimes I think about home. Not about going back, exactly. Just the feel. The smells. The sounds. I think about -BIO:hometown- more than I ever thought I would. It used to feel like the whole world to me, but now I can see it's...a very particular place.^min1Fam`5^max1Fam`9^fam2`5^frnd1`1^innerText`^nodeCategory`BackgroundWhere^categoryDesc`
u.diaSecret: type`Secret^id`secr12^r`n^resp`Info Response^n`2^txt`I generally don't mention this to people, but...I used to have an imaginary friend when I was a child: an invisible clown... [Grumbly bites her nails.] ...what was its name, again? Shmee, I think? I haven't thought about this in so long! It used to make me so very happy, having a loving and devoted companion who was special only to me... [Grumbly bites her nails.] ...it was all me willfully deluding myself, of course, but in some ways, that was nicer than seeing reality clear-eyed.^min1Fam`15^min1Friend`5^fam1`5^fam2`0^frnd1`6^frnd2`6^innerText`^nodeCategory`Secret^categoryDesc`

u.diaTeach: type`Teach^id`tch01^r`y^resp`Teach Response^n`2^txt`I want to show you something. There's this skill that's really handy to know, and I want you to be able to do it, too. Why?...
